CustomField.description: Formula field used in email templates to Product Manager to indicate whether the Service Agreement Change checkbox field is checked or not.
CustomField.formula: IF( Service_Agreement_Change__c , "A Service Agreement/SLA change has been requested. If a change is required to the CPQ printed agreement, please create a task and assign it to Angie Johnson. Select Sales Enablement - ICB as the task type and subject. You may be able to handle this request via a PDF without involving Sales Enablement.", ".")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System Maintained Field: Used in email templates to indicate whether the Service Agreement Change checkbox field is checked or not.
CustomField.label: Service Agreement Change VerbiageProdMgr
